SEARCH

Class tutorialController

java.lang.Object
tutorialController
public class tutorialController extends Object
Controller class for the tutorial screen.

tutorialController handles the functionality of the tutorial screen, allowing users to select a topic, providing hints, displaying scrambled words, and interacting with buttons.

Version:
1.4
Author:
Waleed Aamer
